definition: to provide for/to keep (a mistress)
to cover/to wrap/to hold/to include/to take charge of/to contract (to or for)/package/wrapper/container/bag/to hold or embrace/bundle/packet/CL:個|个[ge4],隻|只[zhi1]
surname Bao
to raise (animals)/to bring up (children)/to keep (pets)/to support/to give birth
wealthy woman
mistress/second wife/lover

to live off a woman
